FH, do can you see how this could happen?

Yes, the foreground color was disposed by the app while StyledText was still 
using it.

- editor reuse on/off?
- any other entries in .log?
- anything happened in the UI (dialog)?
- did you maybe open quickly and then close again or exit?

- no editor reuse
- no other entries in .log
- after it happend it happend when trying to open any other editor
- no quick opening and closing of editors.
- after closing all editors the failure went away and I could open an editor
  again.
Please reopen if you see this again using N20060325-0010 or newer.
